content.detailedDescription:
At 20:10 i picked up a takeaway and decided to drive through the street i live en route to my girlfriend's house. 

we've had a bit of snow fall in the area recently and as there were no clouds, the sky appeared a little lighter than usual. as i approached the street i live in i noticed a large orangeish ball of light in the distance moving left to right (nw to ne) before i even got to my house the object changed course to south and such an angle, it would be too sharp a turn for a standard helicopter.

this freaked me out so much i sped to my house where i quickly got out an rushed inside to get my mother to come see. she was annoyed thinking i was exaggerating. however as soon as she stepped foot outside she was silent. 

this sphere-like object was not only now travelling in a straight line at a constant speed approximately 20-30 degrees above the horizon but it also was spinning changing colour to blue and white. the eerie thing was there was no sound?! 

it was then i took my iphone out and attempted to film it. as with all sightings, the footage is very poor quality but you can tell by how much  i was freaked out by this by my hand shaking on the camera. the object was not moving in all directions. it was a straight line.

i posted the video on facebook where someone commented they had seen it on it's flightpath south of my location.

i've seen a few documentaries in my time and am aware what a weather balloon can look like. this looked nothing like it.The fact that it was going in such a straight line suggests it was controlled ruling out a lantern as well.

logically i would think it must be a helicopter/drone. i am aware there have been a lot of helicopters flying over in the past with the search light on so i know what that looks like. this was at least 3 x bigger than a helicopter could be and too close to be a plane. drones are relatively small so i'm not even going to consider this, but like i said earlier there was no sound so it was definitely not one of these.

i am seriously freaked out by this so would love to know exactly what this was...Any thoughts??
content.summary: Oversized orb flies past my house in rhymney valley, south wales, uk

content.detailedDescription:
I have been observing several large, geometric clouds for weeks that seems to cross the los angeles skies almost daily. on this sunday morning, i had some weird electromagnetic feelings and the animals all around were acting funnyâ€¦dogs barking, birds making odd noises, horses whinnying, etc. it was also accompanied by a rumble that sounds similar to a military jet tooling around over the mountains between the high desert (where edwards air force base and los angeles). as this particular cloud got close, i shot several images, each at about one minute apart. the sunlight was so blinding that i was not able to see the images on my screen. i did not actually see these with my own eyes, but i most definitely felt their presence. there were vibrations in the earth that were almost undetectable. i believe all of the animals around felt it and that is why they were all sounding off. 

in my previous observations. there would be a vibration felt by the animals and then the clouds would change their shape. an example would be from circles to right angles or triangles to waves. i have also noticed ripples in the cirrocumulus cloud layers that do not appear natural during these moments. as well as the cloud shape is the makeup of the clouds. there are halos, zenith arcs, pillars and perihelions a lot of the time. and the "iridescent" clouds are so vivid! 

there are so many things that have caught my attention in our sky way before noticing these crafts on my image. 

please any help with identification is appreciated! or anyone who has seen these as well.
content.summary: I was photographing a geometric cloud which was moving slowly across the sky. i took two images when it got close and the first one had these discs in it and the second one had nothing.

content.detailedDescription: We observed 12 lights that were orange oval orbs with one red oscillating light that seemed to move around the perimeter inside the orange oval orb.  my neighbor called me to come to her apartment to see what she was seeing and to confirm that she was not nuts and just seeing things.  she saw 5 before i arrived and she stated the first one seemed to be triangular with 3 lights.  once i arrived to watch out the window of her apartment, i saw the first one disappear into the clouds.  after that one i started seeing others at a regular time of about 1-2 minutes apart. the last 6 seemed to rise from the ground and ascend up and towards our apartments and continued into the clouds just as they were coming near our apartments.  we did everything we could think of to identify what we thought they could be and we dismissed the possibility of fireworks, luminaries, drones, helicopters, planes, and we could not dismiss them as anything we knew of. we later heard of a family that was nearer than we were that saw these same objects.  we also had a gentleman in our building say that he was listening to a radio talk show that discussed the sightings that appeared in phoenix and anthem in arizona on the same new years eve night.
content.summary: Observed what seemed to be taking off from ground near salt mine area and assending to eventually disapeared into clouds

content.detailedDescription: I had stopped to buy coffee at dunkin donuts and while i sat in my car to drink some and get my bearings because i was tired and it was late i noticed something large moving slightly. i thought it may be a cloud but when i looked closer i can make out a rigid shape, i snapped a photo with  iphone.
content.summary: I saw a large object hoverinng over the gowanus expressway just by the bqe and the batter tunnel

content.detailedDescription:
I am submitting this report on behalf of the eyewitness who wishes to remain completely anonymous. i felt that these sightings were extraordinary having occurred at the same time of day, 4 days in a row, with multiple witnesses and needed to be reported. the following is a description of what the witness saw. 


 i live in sykesville md, & work in frederick md. i travel route 26 quite regularly. never seen anything like what i saw last week. on my ride to work monday january 12th i saw a bright light in the sky. at first i thought it was just a plane but as i continued to drive towards frederick, i knew it was not a plane or anything i knew it to be.

 i passed south carroll high school & sat at the red light and looked slight left or south west of to see if i could figure out what i was looking at. as i started to drive i noticed this bright light was in the shape of a teardrop, with a bright light that didn't really go with the sky canvas that morning. which is why it really stood out. it got real bright then back to its regular brightness, what i first noticed.
  i also noticed below it were smaller lights that obviously were not attached to the light. they were very separate but clearly with the bright light. as i got closer to frederick , maybe just about to taylorsville i noticed two helicopters on either side of the light.
they were black. very synchronized. the helicopters would go towards the light and then the light got brighter and then when they backed off a bit the light went back to its regular brightness. the two lights below were not as big as the bright light. id say they were as big as the helicopters. this went on for at least 30 mins until i got right outside of liberty town, then they were gone. disappeared. this happened at the same time, tues, weds, and thurs. 
 
the only difference the helicopters didn't show up on weds or thurs.

tues morning i had actually  pulled over so i could watch what was going on. there were other people as well that had pulled over to see what was happening..
content.summary: Ufo sighted with black helicopters 4 mornings in a row

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my kinds 
i look to the,sea and sow the object
i ask people around me if they also see the ufo
content.summary: 3 objects in the sky moving at the same era for more thsn 30 min

content.detailedDescription:
My son witnessed this event and he lives in amman jordan and is 20 yrs old.He refused to report but i decided to do it for him as best as i can
my son was in his flat and looking through the window into the night sky in a residential area . the light was grey-white but clearly visible in the cloudy night sky. he thought they were ghosts or lost souls as he imagined. there were 3 objects seen first as in the pics but when he enhanced  the contrast a 4th less brighter object was seen.
they moved chaotically and as if they were playing a game of catch me.
he tried to shoot with video with his iphone but unfortunately he couldnt focus on them to shoot so instead he took pictures...Then enhanced some for a better view.
they suddenly disappeared
content.summary: 3-4 objects moving chaotically over amman jordan

content.detailedDescription: I had just got into bed, it was around 3am in the early hours of sunday morning, 18th jan. there are several gaps in my blinds where they have fallen down, and in one of the largest gaps there was a bright light in the sky. there was no light outside because of council cuts - no streetlamps. we also do not live by main road. the sky was starless, and it was pitchblack in every other area of the sky. i think there must have been heavy cloud cover. previous weather had been that it was sleeting and hailing in the evening. the light looked like a star but bigger, and it was bright white, but the light was throbbing and pulsating from it - at first i thought it was a plane, but i realised later that it couldn't have been because the object was stationary. i stayed in bed and didn't go to the window to look, and from the gap in the blinds, the object drifted to the right handside of the window. the object then disappeared altogether for a brief amount of time, before it returned. the light was still throbbing and then all of a sudden it faded and turned into a greyish colour, and it ascended upwards into the sky and disappeared. i also had bright pink fairylights on at the time and i have heard that bright lights can attract such life? my mum had a similiar experience when she was 6, where bright pink light flooded in through the window, which makes me think that ufos are attracted to a different light colouring. experience lasted about 10 minutes altogether.
content.summary: Looked like star, only bigger. starless sky. light was pulsating through bedroom window. not moving. suddenly disappeared, then came back. object turned grey, faded then ascended into sky and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amateur astronomer with 50 years of sky watching, thousands of hours, a college degree in geology.  until now i have never seen anything in the sky that could not be explained as a natural, although sometimes unusual, event.

i was out in my yard looking for meteors and relaxing when an object appeared from behind my roof.  it was in the sw sky about 15 -18 degrees above the horizon moving to the ese and caught my attention initially as an airplane with red, green and white lights over the trees.   it was far enough away  that the body of the craft was not discernible due to its bright lights and it was clearly high in the sky being visible over the trees at the back of my property. i glanced directly at it and immediately thought there was something very odd in that the lights were blurry, fuzzy looking. more like orbs than the lights of a plane.  there were stars clearly visible nearby that were pinpoints of light so it was just odd in the cloudless sky.  

the object was visible and moving west to se slowly for almost five seconds until it slowed quickly and then stopped completely.  my first thought was that the object was turning and only appeared to stop, but the lights, which were clearly separate colors, were not reorienting themselves as a turning airplane would certainly do.  the red and green light did not blink or change intensity.  the white light on the right (west) side of the object was pulsating, dimming and brightening, unlike an airplane with strobes that blink.  the object appeared to hover for about ten seconds with no other changes in the lights, ruling out a helicopter turning in a hover.  it then abruptly reversed its course back to the nw.  the way that it started moving was too abrupt for a turning airplane, it was almost like a computer animation in that it seemed to jump to its path with no curving motion and a very short period of acceleration followed the initial jump.  it then maintained a very steady, straight path in departing.  i was able to change position and watch the object for several minutes.  i attracted my wife's attention and she was able to see the object also while it departed nw and disappeared near the horizon.

at no time did the orientation of the lights change as i would expect with an airplane. nor were the lights pinpoints as typical with airplanes.  these lights were diffuse orbs that were close enough to overlap.  the brightness of the orbs and dark sky did not allow a hint of the actual shape of the object to show.

i have always been skeptical of stories told by others about lights in the sky because i had never seen anything that i felt was not "explainable" but this event has made me wonder just what i actually saw.  i think that it was definitely not a "normal" aircraft and was obviously a craft under intelligent control.  it was an "unidentified" object that i hope others will have reported and perhaps identified as a natural object, but it was not something that i have ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red & green solid orbs with white pulsing orb. flew in, hovered then reversed course. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: going home from work 135 i saw these randomly flashing lights in a pattern and shape not normally seen on an airplane. i got off the highway at the 77th street exit. at the stop sign to turn onto 77th street i pulled off the side of the road and captured a video with my cell phone. oddly at the end of the video the street light went out. i stopped videoing when a car came up behind me as i didn't want t block traffic. pretty sure it wasn't an airplane -could it have been a squadron of helicopters flying formation?  i couldn't hear anything but my car was making quite a bit of noise and whatever it was seemed pretty far away. any thoughts?
content.summary: I saw randomly flashing lights  in a shape and pattern not normally seen on an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home outside and first a saw the ufo at 19:20 at the same location as last night moving
at a very sold speed like it was in a fixed orbit.  went to bed at 23:00 and was almost over our home at that time. moved about 
about 4-5 miles since first observed in the area of the jackson county airport. 
only saw one last night.
content.summary: Same as last night but only saw 1 this time

content.detailedDescription:
I live in rego park in queens ny. it was friday morning around 6:30am and i went outside to move my car since i was parked by a meter and did not want to get a ticket because the city does street cleaning every morning. i had to move before 7am. 

the moment i left my building i noticed 2 hovering lights off in the distance the lights were pulsating. i saw white, red and yellow lights. i had to move the car so i went to do it.  

after i parked back by my building i still noticed the lights so i videotaped them with my cell phone. i tried to get different views by walking down the block. when i walked back towards my building i noticed there were 3 lights not 2.  there may have been more but my vision was blocked by trees and buildings. 

i was definitely creeped out because i saw a man in the driveway across the street. he saw me videotaping and he ducked behind some cars.  this drive way is actually the back of a block of private houses. the lights had me baffled because i have never seen lights flashing in the sky, standing stationary.  both laguardia and kennedy airports are in queens so i wondered if they were planes in a holding patteren but planes do not stop and hover. i dont think they were helicopters either because i didnt hear anything and it was at least 20 minutes from when i first saw them to when i videotaped them.  if they were copters i would think they would have moved.
content.summary: I observed 3 hovering lights that were pulsating and were equal distance apart.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to see what the dogs were barking at at 01:30 cst at the front of my house facing west at 800 east main street, bismarck, missouri. i always look at the stars at night. but tonight where sirius should be i noticed three vertical lights. then i noticed more of them. as a u.S. army field artillery surveyor i was trained to use the stars to navigate and locate my position on the earth. i am also a trained aerial observer as a stinger nco.
i went back inside and had my wife and daughter both come out to verify what i was seeing. my wife noticed the three red vertical lights to the north at no more than 5 miles away and at about 5000 feet altitude traveling west at for about 3 minutes till they disappeared. we spent about an hour watching the lights till everything seemed to turn back to normal. we tried to use our cell phones to get pictures or video, but could not pick up any light.
i had this feeling that something major is going on and that the government must be covering it up until were ready. i served in the u.S. army for over 20 years and retired as an e-7, sergeant first class.
content.summary: Numerous identical vertical multicolored lights throughout the sky and one moving vertical object composed of 3 bright red lights

content.detailedDescription:
While standing at end of driveway, i observed a object drop from no where. it was from 6 to 10 ft in length... there was no noise it was shaped like a fat egg it pulsated white with orange glowing trim as it moved from left to right there was absolutely no sound...While moving it dripped substance from the bottom..I have not attempted to find out, if it was molten metal. but there is a possibility.If it was plasma it's long gone due to the fact that it occured in july of '14...I have been halfway reluctant to report due to the fact that i don't need the hassle and if the so called men in black show up, well i won't be threatened,,if you want to call you have my info. i will go more into depth then...Better if we are in person. thanks
also couldn't put entire ph. number in middle box.
content.summary: Oval shaped object seemed to appear from no where 6 to 10 ft in length pulsating and dripping substance. moving behind houses.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
The details:
houston, tx january 17, 2015, between 8pm and 8:15 pm.  residential area, close to one of the major freeways.  huge line of glowing orange balls, light is pleasant, not very bright.  lower end of the line starting on the west and climbing towards the east.  line consisted of "clusters", resembling birds' flying triangles.  one small "cluster" was placed a bit father south-east.  all together they were close to 100 lights.  were there without any movement for about 5 min, then disappeared completely.  there was also a light of a plane passing by, which in comparison to these lights was way smaller. unfortunately i was driving and was not able to take photos, by the time i turned around they were almost all gone.
i still "see" it in my mind, very beautiful.
content.summary: Clusters of glowing orange balls in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my girlfriend and her 2 cousins to their house. i had drove this road many times before. we came around a curve where you could see their house about a quarter mile or less away. across the street from their house we saw at that time just a light over the tree line at the top of a hill directly across from their house. we could see it the whole time from when we came around the curve. we got to their gravel road and pulled in i stopped and all 4 of us got out of the car. we stood there about 2 or 3 minutes trying to figure out what it was. it started moving toward us. i saw it was a triangle at that time. it glided down the tree line of the hill never making a sound. it flew about 30 feet above us and my car. looking up i heard no noise and there was no wind coming off of it. the lights were bright but not overpowering. it was about 20 feet from point to point of the triangle. it had white lights on the corners and a red light in the center that was way less bright. it had what looked like metal ribs on the sides of it and it appeared to be only a couple of feet tall. it had weird looking symbols on the bottom, 3 of them. it moved slow. it kept moving until it flew across the road. it went over a cattle field up over another hill and went down over the other side.We watched it till it was out of sight. we jumped back into my car when the shock wore off and we were only about 200 feet from their house. we were all screaming what was that and freaking out. it seemed like it lasted a long time but it was only about 8 or 9 minutes from when we first saw it till it was out of sight. after that my car stereo never worked right again neither did the clock in my car. we told some people what we saw including my girlfriends aunt and uncle and everyone thought we were crazy, even though all 4 of us saw the exact same thing.
content.summary: Triangle craft with whites lights on corners red light in center made no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was something impressive, we thought that we were in a movie, both so after a while we started to have a little scary... we were camping, my child and 2 friends, ones my friends, 9:30 pm, says one who was sitting looking at the sky... che, that hell is that? we look, and a gigantic triangle crossed the sky with a considerable height, back 4 aircraft (which were military insurance) were chasing after him and say that they were aircraft because the 4 led lights that ranges experienced excessive flickering... are lost in orizonte... minute another ship appears in the form of barilla and in each end had lights, back other 4 or 5 planes siguiendo la, and more ago appears another into a ball with a lot of lights and aircraft following the...I looked up at them with a binoculars and it was impressive to see that, the thing that ivan and they came, passed as 3 times from one side to the otro.Despues not have seen more nothing. the fear that gave us!... lol. but it was an experience that i'm telling it to you and it seems to me that i see it.
content.summary: It was 3 ships, a type triangle, bar cylindrical and ball

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in front of my house talking with my son when i noticed this object moving across the street from us above the trees it had no lights and no sound i could see for legs sticking out from corners and was hollow in the middle almost horse shoe shaped i told my son to film it with his phone and he did i went inside to get my wife so she could also see it she thought it was a drone but no noise or propellers actually i tried to find a pic of a drone but not long looked even close only thing that looks close strange as it sounds is a lunar module we watched for about 10 min and followed in car until we lost sight of it it just disappeared
content.summary: Saw an object moving slowly across sky just above trees

content.detailedDescription: First occurrence i was coming back from a party with my father when i saw a bright light flash acrois the sky of the size of what would be a huge meteorite.It zipped across the sky at an insane speed,leaving a sort of trail of light behind it.Me first thinking it was an asteroid but i now know it was not.Then a week later again with my dad and this time with my 4 year old brother.We were leaving our local grocery store again at night like last time (they were 2 hours apart of the occurrences) and i look over to see a orb sitting in the sky of what lined like a large blue star, when it started going across the sky then broke into two and they both flew in perfect alignment away from me for as far as i could see,i was scared,nervous,and worried but still curious.Both sightings at the same spot about, im now a strong believer after these surreal happenings.
content.summary: Bright blue on one occasion and yellow orange another

content.detailedDescription: Went into my back yard and noticed a huge light in the sky.  i see planes flying by all of the time and this dwarfed them.  of course it was much closer than the planes.  it hovered for about 10 minutes.  i took a pic with my phone but it is not real detailed.  the object slowly either dropped and moved away or just slowly moved away but i lost it in the tree line.
content.summary: Huge light hovering over tree tops.  hovered for 10 minutes then clowly movred off

content.detailedDescription:
We are in enumclaw wa. we were looking south. at first we thought the objects were stars. they were white, sparkling, and very beautiful. next thing we noticed , the shapes moving, hovering. three or four of the shapes looked like the divided into two separate lights.  they would hover by each other, than they would become one again. all  were far except one to the left . it came closer to the house. from this one you could see rays shining from it. the objects were very bright. they made no sound.  we would look outside on and off for two hrs. they divided, hovered and moved about those two hours and then , they were gone. made me very nervous when we counted nine of them. the last time we looked they were gone.  my neighbor saw similar sightings three weeks prior.  she also saw one big orb friday night at 12:00 pm. south direction.  thank you, for reading this.  i'd like to mention a friend of mine with his daughter, saw weird lights about 2 years ago in enumclaw, too.  all i can tell you is 
, these things acted nothing  like iv'e seen before comimg from earth.  wish i wouldn't have seen them, to be truthful.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the night of january 14,2015 , my husband and i observed some strange lights or objects, making interesting movements. i first thought it was a star then it moved .  there wasw one ,at the end of two hrs noticed 9. divided and reconnected.

content.detailedDescription:
Several classmates, science teacher, and myself were gathered on a hill behind the high school, after dark. we were there with a telescope to learn about the moon. i would say that less than half of our class had shown up. perhaps 8 or so people.

from left of us, facing the school, appeared almost unnoticed, a hugh triangle shaped object, moving slowly. it was dark but the lights outlined it as a triangle. i recall there were different coloured lights, but today could not say what colour they were. i do not remember any of the lights blinking.

it was dead silent. it appeared to be quite low and massive. we all seen it, but strangely enough, it didn't seem to make much of an impression on most of my classmates???

my science teacher called authorities the next day and was told that there was nothing that should have been flying/floating? in the area.

it has been 30+ years, so i do not know if this report is any help. i had watched several shows on tv that described exactly what we had seen, so i decided to make a report, knowing now that this large triangle ufo sighting is common.

the only technology i know of that could account for what i saw, would be some kind of blimp, however it moved steadily, too slow for an air-foil, and made no noise i could detect. i have excellent hearing.

i have not spoken with the other witnesses about this. it is odd that we mostly ignored the event.
content.summary: Very large silent dark triangle with different colored lights. seen by classmates and teacher.

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv and seen balls of light out of living room window.Ignored them and carried on watching tv.Then when my mind could not figure out what they where i started to stare at them. it looked like aeroplane lights but the lights where kind of still then juggling. i watched this on and off for 10 minutes before i asked my mum what she thought it could be by this time we are both standing up looking out trying to work out what it is.Now 20 mins we've been watching the lights even more perplexed as to why if it was a plane it's not moved. and then the lights shoot up like a rocket so fast like i've never seen. but my mum seen it too so i know i wasn't crazy. still talkin about it we sit back down then notice the lights come back.They seem stiller but faster when they juggle. at this time i'm around 23 ish and my mum is a good 27 years older than me so we are not kids. i tell her i'm getting in the car and going to the water front where i will get a better view, so she comes with me leaving my dad on the sofa speechless thinking we are crazy but not bothering to look himself. 5 minute drive to the wirral side of the river mersey, so now we can see from the airport for about 10 miles maybe not sure. but we find the lights easy enough and seems they have been  hiding when a plane takes off or lands by hiding i mean shoots very high in the sky, then comes back down a minute or so later. some times the lights are close together and other times they split up a bit but nearly always in a triangle shape. the lights suddenly zoom to the other end of the skyline stay there for a few seconds and zoom back to close to the airport again they do this a few times like they are playing a game but move so fast it's like they just appear at one end then the other over a distance of about 10 miles very strange but each time they get back close to the airport they juggle about like they are communicating. contact/sight lost when lights zoomed straight up we waited for about 20 mins but nothing came back.This experience lasted over 1 hour ( pluss20 mins waiting) and was so weird we actually went home and put the news on thinking lots of people would of reported it but it wasn't even on the radio. i thought about calling the airport to see if they had any reports of ufos but clearly as we see at least 1 take off and 1 land they could not of been worried.No reports in local papers either so all left in explained.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering super fast balls of light

content.detailedDescription: At work 4 12 shift went outside for a smoke turned around bld. noticed opening in sky over ambridge pa. white orangeish bigger the orb orange orb opened traveled sse, thought it was going to land in river apx. 3 to 4 miles away it went on a course that i could not judge height, thought it was low but guest not ,no height reference.    orange yellow  fuzy orb traveled till out of sight.
content.summary: Bright light white mix orange orifice appeared then orange white yellow orb traveled  sse

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving alone towards santa barbara on hwy 154 before dusk. i am not sure of the year or month, however, i believe it was'77 or'78 in early summer. this is very near to lake cachuma. very few if any other cars were on the road. i drove over a hill and saw the ufo to the right of center through my windshield. it was moving very slowly, several miles per hour only, and was about to begin crossing over the roadway.  i could clearly see the entire profile of the craft; could have hit with a slingshot. since i could not take my eyes off of it, i slowly eased my car to the dirt shoulder of the two-lane road. 

i got out of my car and could easily hear the whirring hum emanating from it. it is my belief that at this point, after i was standing still staring at it for maybe ten seconds, that it, or them, saw or detected me. at that point the whirring hum began to increase in volume while also beginning to pulsate. the vehicle began to move a little faster, and then, at the same time the noise it made reached a crescendo, it sped off unbelievably fast, almost in a blur,and went over a hilltop, at which point i could no longer see or hear it.

i was driving to see friends in the san fernando valley for the weekend. i lived in morro bay. when i arrived at my friends we had an extended conversation about my experience, and theirs, late into the night. the most memorable aspects to the encounter were how close and perfectly clear it was, the otherworldly sound it made, and the phenomenal speed it attained on its exit from the area.
content.summary: 100'-150' long; semi-reflective exterior color, cigar-shaped with conical ends.

content.detailedDescription: I moved to a new house a few months ago. i live down a long road with a clear view of the mountain near me. one night i was sitting at the end of my drive way and i saw a light moving in a very crazy pattern. up and down and side to side but still staying in a general area. i watched this for about 3 min when it seemed to absorb in to itself and disappear. since then i have seen the same light 4 more times. doing the same thing each time. last night around 2 am i got into my boyfriends car to leave. i looked up and saw what looked like a strobe light in the air. it was dim, and looked kinda far. it also didn't have a set pattern the lights were going off. so we decided to drive towards it. when we reached the end of my neighborhood we saw the light. way clearer now and we saw that it was a flying object. it was moving very slow, and it passed directly over us. it was lower than a plane, but higher than the treetops. when it got directly over us we looked out from the car. the bottom of the craft was two red glowing circles. and that's flashing light we originally saw. the red lights reminded me of a stove burner. very red, but not shining. it looked almost like a triangle. when we started driving again and got on the main road we still saw the strobe looking light, i could no longer see the red lights. we watched the strobe light for about 4 more min until it disappeared altogether.
content.summary: Flying objects flying lights multiple

content.detailedDescription:
January 17,2015 at 4:45am pst.I stepped out in front of house to have a smoke.Just then i saw what i thought was going to be just another shooting star.But it didn't fade out like a regular meteorite.Coming down out of the north sky almost straight up,it veered a bit to the east.It got larger as it approached the earth.It was a bright silver/blue/white shining object that was more horizontal than vertical in shape.Although it was traveling at a terrific high rate of speed,it did appear to slow down slightly before i lost sight of it behind the houses and trees to the northeast.It seemed to have come down within a one to five mile distance from me.Coincidentally that would be on or near the nellis afb which begins a half mile east of me.
could this object have landed there? i'm thinking it's possible.
content.summary: Glowing object came down out of the sky, and it appeared to slow down before it would have made impact with earth.

content.detailedDescription: The witness that saw the object is a septic but he donÂ´t know what he saw, than he told me about it. i believe that can be something that we canÂ´t explain. he have more pictures. the photos was taken by a good telescope. i want to know if mufon have some expertise in clarify photos. thanks for the attention.
content.summary: At night. moving slowly. whit a telescope.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to pick up my son. it caught my attention for three miles by appearing as one bright white light in the sky. it was impersonating a star by hovering. i knew it wasn't a star. so i drove closer to the object to get a better view of it. i joked with my kids by asking them if they wanted to see a ufo. the light went dim, to nothing, then real bright, then back to one bright white light. as i turned to let my kids get a better view, the object started pulsating multiple lights of white, red, blue. it began following us. it knew, we were watching it. i was scared at first. my children were so frightened that they began yelling and swearing that it was a real ufo!!! that they don't want to look at it no more. i turned to where it was populated with people in a neighborhood. it continued to follow us.  when i turned, the object turned off all it's lights. i was wondering where it went. i asked my kids, "where is it? where did it go?" my kids said, "above us." it revealed itself to us. as it was passing above us, i rolled down my window to look underneath it. i seen a black star ship with multiple lines of reddish/orange lights underneath it. it made no noise. 
i wondered if anyone else could see this object. i have a question. do military planes/jets have this type of lighting underneath? i feel like this object revealed itself to us, to show us, it's true form. when it was over our car, i didn't feel scared anymore. i was in awe, and wanted to stop my car and watch it, and take a clear picture. my children on the other hand continued to be frightened. it continued going sw. i lost sight of it at a dead end dirt road, above the tree lines. as the object left, this is weird, but i felt blessed that it revealed itself to us. i looked through picture after picture, video after video. i have yet to see any video or picture of what we seen that night. since that experience, i continue to see more ufos. it's as if i know now what to look for. i have pictures and videos. i don't know how to upload, download, forward, or transfer this data. but i have it on my old cell phone. i also have captured a picture of a weird looking creature while trying to take a picture of another ufo. i would like an expert to look at my pictures and videos and hopefully explain to me, what i am seeing. i did speak to a few men from mufon after i seen this object. they were from duluth, minnesota. i unfortunately lost their phone numbers.
content.summary: Reddish/orange lines underneath the entire object.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window and saw a bright silver object , it rotated and went from silver to red, pulsed . no noise. it was tree top.
content.summary: Saw the object swirling and moving silver to red, and flashing
